name: Twin Stick Prototype
description:
This game REQUIRES a PS4 controller to play. Unfortunately WebGL currently does not register the touch pad, L2 or R2, which are needed to play this demo.

I built during my last semester at school (August 2017) this to test out a concept for a dual-wielding 3rd person shooter, as well as building a game around console-oriented mechanics. Up to this point, I'd only build mobile/browser friendly games.
